009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Random;
014
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Curve2d;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
017import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
018
019/**
020 * Generic RANSAC detector. This abstract class defines the core RANSAC
021 * functionality used by all derived (concrete) classes.
022 * TODO: Consider moving {@link RandomDraw} here.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * 
026 * @see RansacDetectorLine
027 * @see RansacDetectorCircle
028 * @see RansacDetectorEllipse
029 *
030 * @param <T> primitive type
031 */
032public abstract class GenericRansacDetector<T extends Curve2d> {
033        
034        /**
035         * Parameters used by all RANSAC types.
036         * @author WB
037         *
038         */
039        public static class RansacParameters implements ParameterBundle {
040                @DialogLabel("Max. iterations")
041                public int maxIterations = 1000;
042                
043                @DialogLabel("Distance threshold")
044                public double distanceThreshold = 2.0;
045                
046                @DialogLabel("Min. support count")
047                public int minSupportCount = 100;
048        }
049        
050        // -----------------------------------------------------------
051        
052        private final RansacParameters params;
053        private final int K;                                            // number of points to draw
054        private final Random rand;                                      // random number generator
055        private final RandomDraw<Pnt2d> randomDraw;     // 
056        
057        protected GenericRansacDetector(int K, RansacParameters params) {
058                this.K = K;
059                this.params = params;
060                this.rand = new Random();
061                this.randomDraw = new RandomDraw<>(rand);
062        }
063        
064        // -----------------------------------------------------------
065        
066        /**
067         * Returns this detector's random generator. This can be used, e.g.,
068         * to set its seed (by {@link Random#setSeed(long)}).
069         * 
070         * @return the random generator
071         */
072        public Random getRandom() {
073                return this.rand;
074        }
075        
076        // ----------------------------------------------------------
077        
078        protected int countInliers(T curve, Pnt2d[] points) {
079                int count = 0;
080                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
081                        if (p != null) {
082                                double d = curve.getDistance(p);
083                                if (d < params.distanceThreshold) {
084                                        count++;
085                                }
086                        }
087                }
088                return count;
089        }
090        
091        protected Pnt2d[] collectInliers(Curve2d curve, Pnt2d[] points, boolean removeInliers) {
092                List<Pnt2d> pList = new ArrayList<>();
093                for (int i = 0; i < points.length; i++) {
094                        Pnt2d p = points[i];
095                        if (p != null) {
096                                double d = curve.getDistance(p);
097                                if (d < params.distanceThreshold) {
098                                        pList.add(p);
099                                        if (removeInliers) {
100                                                points[i] = null;
101                                        }
102                                }
103                        }
104                }
105                return pList.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
106        }
107        
108        /**
109         * Performs a single RANSAC step on the supplied point set and removes
110         * all associated inlier points.
111         * 
112         * @param points an array of {@link Pnt2d} instances (modified)
113         * @return the detected primitive (of generic type T) or {@code null} if unsuccessful
114         * 
115         * @see #findNext(Pnt2d[], boolean)
116         */
117        public RansacResult<T> findNext(Pnt2d[] points) {
118                return findNext(points, true);
119        }
120        
121        /**
122         * Performs a single RANSAC step on the supplied point set. Optionally,
123         * all associated inlier points are removed from the point set by setting
124         * array elements to {@code null}.
125         * 
126         * 
127         * @param points an array of {@link Pnt2d} instances (modified)
128         * @param removeInliers set true to remove inliers are from the point set
129         * @return the detected primitive (of generic type T) or {@code null} if unsuccessful
130         */
131        public RansacResult<T> findNext(Pnt2d[] points, boolean removeInliers) {
132                Pnt2d[] drawInit = null;
133                double scoreInit = -1;
134                T primitiveInit = null;
135                
136                for (int i = 0; i < params.maxIterations; i++) {
137                        Pnt2d[] draw = drawRandomPoints(points);
138                        T primitive = fitInitial(draw);
139                        if (primitive == null) {
140                                continue;
141                        }
142                        double score = countInliers(primitive, points);
143                        if (score >= params.minSupportCount && score > scoreInit) {
144                                scoreInit = score;
145                                drawInit = draw;
146                                primitiveInit = primitive;
147                        }
148                }
149                
150                if (primitiveInit == null) {
151                        return null;
152                }
153                else {
154                        // refit the primitive to all inliers:
155                        Pnt2d[] inliers = collectInliers(primitiveInit, points, removeInliers);
156                        T primitiveFinal = fitFinal(inliers);   
157                        if (primitiveFinal != null)
158                                return new RansacResult<T>(drawInit, primitiveInit, primitiveFinal, scoreInit, inliers);
159                        else
160                                throw new RuntimeException("final fit failed!");
161                }
162        }
163        
164        /**
165         * Randomly selects {@link #K} unique points from the supplied {@link Pnt2d} array.
166         * Inheriting classes may override this method to enforce specific constraints 
167         * on the selected points (e.g., see {@link RansacDetectorLine}).
168         * 
169         * @param points an array of {@link Pnt2d} instances
170         * @return an array of {@link #K} unique points
171         */
172        protected Pnt2d[] drawRandomPoints(Pnt2d[] points) {    
173                return randomDraw.drawFrom(points, K);
174        }
175        
176        // abstract methods to be implemented by specific sub-classes: -----------------------
177        
178        /**
179         * Fits an initial primitive to the specified points.
180         * This abstract method must be implemented by inheriting classes,
181         * which must also specify the required number of initial points ({@link #K}).
182         * 
183         * @param draw an array of exactly {@link #K} points
184         * @return a new primitive of type T
185         */
186        protected abstract T fitInitial(Pnt2d[] draw);
187        
188        /**
189         * Fits a primitive to the specified points.
190         * This abstract method must be implemented by inheriting classes.
191         * 
192         * @param inliers an array of at least {@link #K} points
193         * @return a new primitive of type T.
194         */
195        protected abstract T fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers);
196        
197}
